content: if anyone is curious about prater, first validator id with 0x01 creds is 210001, and there's only 32_440 validators with 0x01 creds, so roughly 2534 slots at 80% inclusion will cover withdrawals for every validator that qualifies... so roughly 3 payouts a day initially...
